00036  * lnet/lnet/lib-md.c

00038  * Memory Descriptor management routines

00041 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LNET
00042 
00043 #include <lnet/lib-lnet.h>
00044 
00045 /* must be called with lnet_res_lock held */
00046 void
00047 lnet_md_unlink(lnet_libmd_t *md)
00048 {
00049         if ((md->md_flags & LNET_MD_FLAG_ZOMBIE) == 0) {
00050                 /* first unlink attempt... */
00051                 lnet_me_t *me = md->md_me;
00052 
00053                 md->md_flags |= LNET_MD_FLAG_ZOMBIE;
00054 
00055                 /* Disassociate from ME (if any), and unlink it if it was created
00056                  * with LNET_UNLINK */
00057                 if (me != NULL) {
00058                         /* detach MD from portal */
00059                         lnet_ptl_detach_md(me, md);
00060                         if (me->me_unlink == LNET_UNLINK)
00061                                 lnet_me_unlink(me);
00062                 }
00063 
00064                 /* ensure all future handle lookups fail */
00065                 lnet_res_lh_invalidate(&md->md_lh);
00066         }
00067 
00068         if (md->md_refcount != 0) {
00069                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Queueing unlink of md %p\n", md);
00070                 return;
00071         }
00072 
00073         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Unlinking md %p\n", md);
00074 
00075         if (md->md_eq != NULL) {
00076                 int     cpt = lnet_cpt_of_cookie(md->md_lh.lh_cookie);
00077 
00078                 LASSERT(*md->md_eq->eq_refs[cpt] > 0);
00079                 (*md->md_eq->eq_refs[cpt])--;
00080         }
00081 
00082         LASSERT(!list_empty(&md->md_list));
00083         list_del_init(&md->md_list);
00084         lnet_md_free(md);
00085 }
00086 
00087 static int
00088 lnet_md_build(lnet_libmd_t *lmd, lnet_md_t *umd, int unlink)
00089 {
00090         int          i;
00091         unsigned int niov;
00092         int          total_length = 0;
00093 
00094         lmd->md_me = NULL;
00095         lmd->md_start = umd->start;
00096         lmd->md_offset = 0;
00097         lmd->md_max_size = umd->max_size;
00098         lmd->md_options = umd->options;
00099         lmd->md_user_ptr = umd->user_ptr;
00100         lmd->md_eq = NULL;
00101         lmd->md_threshold = umd->threshold;
00102         lmd->md_refcount = 0;
00103         lmd->md_flags = (unlink == LNET_UNLINK) ? LNET_MD_FLAG_AUTO_UNLINK : 0;
00104 
00105         if ((umd->options & LNET_MD_IOVEC) != 0) {
00106 
00107                 if ((umd->options & LNET_MD_KIOV) != 0) /* Can't specify both */
00108                         return -EINVAL;
00109 
00110                 lmd->md_niov = niov = umd->length;
00111                 memcpy(lmd->md_iov.iov, umd->start,
00112                        niov * sizeof (lmd->md_iov.iov[0]));
00113 
00114                 for (i = 0; i < (int)niov; i++) {
00115                         /* We take the base address on trust */
00116                         if (lmd->md_iov.iov[i].iov_len <= 0) /* invalid length */
00117                                 return -EINVAL;
00118 
00119                         total_length += lmd->md_iov.iov[i].iov_len;
00120                 }
00121 
00122                 lmd->md_length = total_length;
00123 
00124                 if ((umd->options & LNET_MD_MAX_SIZE) != 0 && /* max size used */
00125                     (umd->max_size < 0 ||
00126                      umd->max_size > total_length)) // illegal max_size
00127                         return -EINVAL;
00128 
00129         } else if ((umd->options & LNET_MD_KIOV) != 0) {
00130                 lmd->md_niov = niov = umd->length;
00131                 memcpy(lmd->md_iov.kiov, umd->start,
00132                        niov * sizeof (lmd->md_iov.kiov[0]));
00133 
00134                 for (i = 0; i < (int)niov; i++) {
00135                         /* We take the page pointer on trust */
00136                         if (lmd->md_iov.kiov[i].kiov_offset +
00137                             lmd->md_iov.kiov[i].kiov_len > PAGE_CACHE_SIZE)
00138                                 return -EINVAL; /* invalid length */
00139 
00140                         total_length += lmd->md_iov.kiov[i].kiov_len;
00141                 }
00142 
00143                 lmd->md_length = total_length;
00144 
00145                 if ((umd->options & LNET_MD_MAX_SIZE) != 0 && /* max size used */
00146                     (umd->max_size < 0 ||
00147                      umd->max_size > total_length)) // illegal max_size
00148                         return -EINVAL;
00149         } else {   /* contiguous */
00150                 lmd->md_length = umd->length;
00151                 lmd->md_niov = niov = 1;
00152                 lmd->md_iov.iov[0].iov_base = umd->start;
00153                 lmd->md_iov.iov[0].iov_len = umd->length;
00154 
00155                 if ((umd->options & LNET_MD_MAX_SIZE) != 0 && /* max size used */
00156                     (umd->max_size < 0 ||
00157                      umd->max_size > (int)umd->length)) // illegal max_size
00158                         return -EINVAL;
00159         }
00160 
00161         return 0;
00162 }
00163 
00164 /* must be called with resource lock held */
00165 static int
00166 lnet_md_link(lnet_libmd_t *md, lnet_handle_eq_t eq_handle, int cpt)
00167 {
00168         struct lnet_res_container *container = the_lnet.ln_md_containers[cpt];
00169 
00170         /* NB we are passed an allocated, but inactive md.
00171          * if we return success, caller may lnet_md_unlink() it.
00172          * otherwise caller may only lnet_md_free() it.
00173          */
00174         /* This implementation doesn't know how to create START events or
00175          * disable END events.  Best to LASSERT our caller is compliant so
00176          * we find out quickly...  */
00177         /*  TODO - reevaluate what should be here in light of
00178          * the removal of the start and end events
00179          * maybe there we shouldn't even allow LNET_EQ_NONE!)
00180          * LASSERT (eq == NULL);
00181          */
00182         if (!LNetHandleIsInvalid(eq_handle)) {
00183                 md->md_eq = lnet_handle2eq(&eq_handle);
00184 
00185                 if (md->md_eq == NULL)
00186                         return -ENOENT;
00187 
00188                 (*md->md_eq->eq_refs[cpt])++;
00189         }
00190 
00191         lnet_res_lh_initialize(container, &md->md_lh);
00192 
00193         LASSERT(list_empty(&md->md_list));
00194         list_add(&md->md_list, &container->rec_active);
00195 
00196         return 0;
00197 }
00198 
00199 /* must be called with lnet_res_lock held */
00200 void
00201 lnet_md_deconstruct(lnet_libmd_t *lmd, lnet_md_t *umd)
00202 {
00203         /* NB this doesn't copy out all the iov entries so when a
00204          * discontiguous MD is copied out, the target gets to know the
00205          * original iov pointer (in start) and the number of entries it had
00206          * and that's all.
00207          */
00208         umd->start = lmd->md_start;
00209         umd->length = ((lmd->md_options & (LNET_MD_IOVEC | LNET_MD_KIOV)) == 0) ?
00210                       lmd->md_length : lmd->md_niov;
00211         umd->threshold = lmd->md_threshold;
00212         umd->max_size = lmd->md_max_size;
00213         umd->options = lmd->md_options;
00214         umd->user_ptr = lmd->md_user_ptr;
00215         lnet_eq2handle(&umd->eq_handle, lmd->md_eq);
00216 }
00217 
00218 static int
00219 lnet_md_validate(lnet_md_t *umd)
00220 {
00221         if (umd->start == NULL && umd->length != 0) {
00222                 CERROR("MD start pointer can not be NULL with length %u\n",
00223                        umd->length);
00224                 return -EINVAL;
00225         }
00226 
00227         if ((umd->options & (LNET_MD_KIOV | LNET_MD_IOVEC)) != 0 &&
00228             umd->length > LNET_MAX_IOV) {
00229                 CERROR("Invalid option: too many fragments %u, %d max\n",
00230                        umd->length, LNET_MAX_IOV);
00231                 return -EINVAL;
00232         }
00233 
00234         return 0;
00235 }
00236 
00262 int
00263 LNetMDAttach(lnet_handle_me_t meh, lnet_md_t umd,
00264              lnet_unlink_t unlink, lnet_handle_md_t *handle)
00265 {
00266         struct list_head        matches = LIST_HEAD_INIT(matches);
00267         struct list_head        drops = LIST_HEAD_INIT(drops);
00268         struct lnet_me          *me;
00269         struct lnet_libmd       *md;
00270         int                     cpt;
00271         int                     rc;
00272 
00273         LASSERT (the_lnet.ln_refcount > 0);
00274 
00275         if (lnet_md_validate(&umd) != 0)
00276                 return -EINVAL;
00277 
00278         if ((umd.options & (LNET_MD_OP_GET | LNET_MD_OP_PUT)) == 0) {
00279                 CERROR("Invalid option: no MD_OP set\n");
00280                 return -EINVAL;
00281         }
00282 
00283         md = lnet_md_alloc(&umd);
00284         if (md == NULL)
00285                 return -ENOMEM;
00286 
00287         rc = lnet_md_build(md, &umd, unlink);
00288         cpt = lnet_cpt_of_cookie(meh.cookie);
00289 
00290         lnet_res_lock(cpt);
00291         if (rc != 0)
00292                 goto failed;
00293 
00294         me = lnet_handle2me(&meh);
00295         if (me == NULL)
00296                 rc = -ENOENT;
00297         else if (me->me_md != NULL)
00298                 rc = -EBUSY;
00299         else
00300                 rc = lnet_md_link(md, umd.eq_handle, cpt);
00301 
00302         if (rc != 0)
00303                 goto failed;
00304 
00305         /* attach this MD to portal of ME and check if it matches any
00306          * blocked msgs on this portal */
00307         lnet_ptl_attach_md(me, md, &matches, &drops);
00308 
00309         lnet_md2handle(handle, md);
00310 
00311         lnet_res_unlock(cpt);
00312 
00313         lnet_drop_delayed_msg_list(&drops, "Bad match");
00314         lnet_recv_delayed_msg_list(&matches);
00315 
00316         return 0;
00317 
00318  failed:
00319         lnet_md_free(md);
00320 
00321         lnet_res_unlock(cpt);
00322         return rc;
00323 }
00324 EXPORT_SYMBOL(LNetMDAttach);
00325 
00342 int
00343 LNetMDBind(lnet_md_t umd, lnet_unlink_t unlink, lnet_handle_md_t *handle)
00344 {
00345         lnet_libmd_t    *md;
00346         int             cpt;
00347         int             rc;
00348 
00349         LASSERT (the_lnet.ln_refcount > 0);
00350 
00351         if (lnet_md_validate(&umd) != 0)
00352                 return -EINVAL;
00353 
00354         if ((umd.options & (LNET_MD_OP_GET | LNET_MD_OP_PUT)) != 0) {
00355                 CERROR("Invalid option: GET|PUT illegal on active MDs\n");
00356                 return -EINVAL;
00357         }
00358 
00359         md = lnet_md_alloc(&umd);
00360         if (md == NULL)
00361                 return -ENOMEM;
00362 
00363         rc = lnet_md_build(md, &umd, unlink);
00364 
00365         cpt = lnet_res_lock_current();
00366         if (rc != 0)
00367                 goto failed;
00368 
00369         rc = lnet_md_link(md, umd.eq_handle, cpt);
00370         if (rc != 0)
00371                 goto failed;
00372 
00373         lnet_md2handle(handle, md);
00374 
00375         lnet_res_unlock(cpt);
00376         return 0;
00377 
00378  failed:
00379         lnet_md_free(md);
00380 
00381         lnet_res_unlock(cpt);
00382         return rc;
00383 }
00384 EXPORT_SYMBOL(LNetMDBind);
00385 
00416 int
00417 LNetMDUnlink (lnet_handle_md_t mdh)
00418 {
00419         lnet_event_t    ev;
00420         lnet_libmd_t    *md;
00421         int             cpt;
00422 
00423         LASSERT(the_lnet.ln_refcount > 0);
00424 
00425         cpt = lnet_cpt_of_cookie(mdh.cookie);
00426         lnet_res_lock(cpt);
00427 
00428         md = lnet_handle2md(&mdh);
00429         if (md == NULL) {
00430                 lnet_res_unlock(cpt);
00431                 return -ENOENT;
00432         }
00433 
00434         md->md_flags |= LNET_MD_FLAG_ABORTED;
00435         /* If the MD is busy, lnet_md_unlink just marks it for deletion, and
00436          * when the LND is done, the completion event flags that the MD was
00437          * unlinked. Otherwise, we enqueue an event now... */
00438         if (md->md_eq != NULL && md->md_refcount == 0) {
00439                 lnet_build_unlink_event(md, &ev);
00440                 lnet_eq_enqueue_event(md->md_eq, &ev);
00441         }
00442 
00443         lnet_md_unlink(md);
00444 
00445         lnet_res_unlock(cpt);
00446         return 0;
00447 }
00448 EXPORT_SYMBOL(LNetMDUnlink);
